files.help:
Supported since _5.6.0_.

You can either delete or move the folder to _$XDG_CACHE_HOME/cinnamon/spices_.

Supported since _5.6.0_.

You can move the folder to _$XDG_DATA_HOME/cinnamon/panel-launchers_.

Supported since _5.6.0_.

You can move the folder to _$XDG_DATA_HOME/cinnamon/backgrounds_.

Supported since _5.6.0_.

You can move the folder to _$XDG_CONFIG_HOME/cinnamon/spices_.

Supported since _5.6.0_.

You can either delete or move the file to _$XDG_STATE_HOME/cinnamon/glass.log_.

Supported since _5.6.0_.

You can either delete or move the file to _$XDG_STATE_HOME/cinnamon/harvester.log_.
